title: Bug 2345: Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open
description: When trying to open a file with a different type of editor, it doesn't have any effect if the file is already open.
OB: When the user selects a file already open in the editor and chooses 'Open With...' -> 'Default Text Editor', nothing happens. The file remains open in its current editor.
EB: When the user selects a file already open in the editor and chooses 'Open With...' -> 'Default Text Editor', a new instance of the file should open in the default text editor.
SR:
1. Open a new basic project.
2. Create a new file called test.xml.
3. Verify that the current editor used for the file is the scripted resource editor.
4. In the Navigator, select the test.xml file.
5. Right-click on the file and choose 'Open With...' -> 'Default Text Editor'.
6. Verify that a new editor is opened for the file and it is using the default text editor.
